review: Fire TV Stick is not there yet.  It constantly locks up and has software issues.  The remote gets non-responsive and I have to unplug the device to reset everything.  Also, I can't figure out how to turn it off.  The instructions do not include how to turn it off (if there is a way to turn it off).  I would not recommend this device at this time.  It needs work.  Also, it's not totally wireless.  You still have to have it close to an outlet so it can be plugged in.  This was not made clear as there's no picture of the power cord in the product photos.  I also have a regular Fire TV.  It works great.  I haven't had the same software problems with it or the non-responsive remote.  Not wireless but neither is this stick.
author: Justin Daniels
